metadata.description: Comprehensive database of VC-relevant skills, MCP servers, and connectors for venture capital workflows

skills.name: Deep Research Skill
skills.description: 7-phase multi-agent research system with parallel queries, multi-source verification, and hypothesis-driven investigation. Produces decision-grade, auditable outputs that resist hallucination.
skills.notes: Has financial domain overlay for SEC filings. Classifies research as Type A-D based on complexity.

skills.name: PitchBook Connector
skills.description: Official PitchBook MCP connector providing access to 8.5M+ private companies, 2.8M deals, 597K investors, and 154K funds. Enables searching and analyzing firms, deals, funds, and key players.
skills.notes: Read-only access. Requires active PitchBook subscription.

skills.name: S&P Capital IQ Connector
skills.description: Access S&P Capital IQ data for comprehensive financial analysis, company profiles, and market intelligence.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Daloopa Connector
skills.description: Access Daloopa's financial data extraction and modeling capabilities for automated financial statement analysis.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Morningstar Connector
skills.description: Access Morningstar investment research, ratings, and analysis for public companies and funds.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Aiera Connector
skills.description: Real-time earnings call transcripts and investor event summaries for public companies.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Third Bridge Connector
skills.description: Expert interviews and industry intelligence with insights from domain experts across sectors.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Chronograph Connector
skills.description: Portfolio monitoring and due diligence for private equity with operational and financial performance metrics.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Egnyte Connector
skills.description: Secure document search and access control for data rooms, investment documents, and financial models.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: LSEG Connector
skills.description: Live market data from London Stock Exchange Group including fixed income, equities, FX rates, and macro indicators.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: Moody's Connector
skills.description: Credit ratings, research, and company data on 600M+ public and private companies for credit analysis.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: MT Newswires Connector
skills.description: Global multi-asset class news on financial markets and economies for real-time market intelligence.
skills.notes: Accessed via Claude integrations settings

skills.name: 3-Statement Financial Modeling Skill
